headline: Baker Hughes, Cactus Announce Closing of Surface Pressure Control Joint Venture
summary: Transaction strengthens balance sheet and liquidity with $344.5 million of cash proceeds before customary closing adjustments HOUSTON and LONDON, Jan. 02, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Baker Hughes (NASDAQ: BKR, “the Company”), an energy technology company, announced Friday the final closing of its previously announced joint venture with a subsidiary of Cactus, Inc., in which Baker Hughes has contributed its surface pressure control (SPC) product line. headline: Cactus Completes Previously Announced Acquisition of 65% Controlling Interest in Baker Hughes’s Surface Pressure Control Business
summary: HOUSTON, January 02, 2026--Cactus, Inc. (NYSE: WHD) ("Cactus" or the "Company") today announced the completion of the acquisition of a majority interest in Baker Hughes Company’s Surface Pressure Control business ("SPC" or "the Business"). Formal financial guidance for the Business will be provided later in the first quarter of 2026.
